description: Contains invoice header information for billed sales orders.

columns.name: InvoiceID
columns.description: Primary key. Unique identifier for each invoice.

columns.name: CustomerID
columns.description: Foreign key to Sales.Customers for the invoiced customer.

columns.name: BillToCustomerID
columns.description: Foreign key to Sales.Customers for the bill-to customer.

columns.name: OrderID
columns.description: Foreign key to Sales.Orders for the related sales order.

columns.name: DeliveryMethodID
columns.description: Foreign key to Application.DeliveryMethods.

columns.name: ContactPersonID
columns.description: Foreign key to Application.People for the customer contact.

columns.name: AccountsPersonID
columns.description: Foreign key to Application.People for the accounts staff member.

columns.name: SalespersonPersonID
columns.description: Foreign key to Application.People for the salesperson.

columns.name: PackedByPersonID
columns.description: Foreign key to Application.People for the packer.

columns.name: InvoiceDate
columns.description: Date the invoice was issued.

columns.name: CustomerPurchaseOrderNumber
columns.description: Customer's purchase order reference.

columns.name: IsCreditNote
columns.description: Indicates if this is a credit note rather than an invoice.

columns.name: CreditNoteReason
columns.description: Reason for the credit note if applicable.

columns.name: Comments
columns.description: Additional comments on the invoice.

columns.name: DeliveryInstructions
columns.description: Special delivery instructions.

columns.name: InternalComments
columns.description: Internal notes not visible to customer.

columns.name: TotalDryItems
columns.description: Count of dry goods items on the invoice.

columns.name: TotalChillerItems
columns.description: Count of chiller items requiring cold storage.

columns.name: DeliveryRun
columns.description: Delivery run identifier.

columns.name: RunPosition
columns.description: Position within the delivery run.

columns.name: ReturnedDeliveryData
columns.description: JSON data returned from delivery confirmation.

columns.name: ConfirmedDeliveryTime
columns.description: Timestamp when delivery was confirmed.

columns.name: ConfirmedReceivedBy
columns.description: Name of person who received the delivery.
